mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS createId, u.name, u.thumb, a.id, a.content, a.cat1, a.timeUpdate, a.storePath, a.img1, a.img2, a.img3, a.numReply, a.numLike, a.draft, a.audit FROM analysis a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.`creator` = u.`id` WHERE a.`delFlag` = 0 -- AND a.`draft` = 0 -- AND a.`audit` = 0 AND a.`ref1` = 0 AND a.`delFlag` = 0 AND a.`id` = #{id}

SELECT u.id AS createId, u.name, u.`thumb`, a.`id`, a.`content`, a.`cat1`, a.`timeUpdate` FROM analysis a LEFT JOIN `user` u ON a.`creator` = u.`id` WHERE a.`delFlag` = 0 AND a.`draft` = 0 AND a.`audit` = 0 AND a.`ref1` = #{analysisId} AND a.`ref2` = 0 AND a.`delFlag` = 0 AND a.`draft` = 0 AND a.`audit` = 0 ORDER BY id

SELECT u.id AS createId, u.name, u.thumb, a.id, a.content, a.cat1, a.timeUpdate, a.storePath, a.draft, a.audit, a.img1, a.img2, a.img3, a.`numLike`, a.`numReply` FROM analysis a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.`creator` = u.`id` WHERE a.`delFlag` = 0 AND a.creator = #{myId} AND a.`ref1` = 0 ORDER BY draft DESC, audit DESC,timeUpdate DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, 10
